name: Mirrors of Albion
description:
Mind Fitness: Your daily mind flex with the best puzzle games!

Solve the mystery of Alice’s disappearance!

Get ready for a Lewis Carroll inspired hidden object game that will transport you to a mystical Victorian-era London, fraught with intrigue, crime, and danger. Just like Alice on her journey to Wonderland, you’ll have to solve challenging puzzles and face unexplained mysteries. Experience the game's unique story by tackling countless quests on your mission to foil the Queen of Hearts' evil schemes. Download Alice in the Mirrors of Albion and set off on an adventure in this truly extraordinary and magical world right now!

**KEY FEATURES**

• FIND HIDDEN OBJECTS
Track down all sorts of items in several exciting game modes and explore a wide range of locations, from the dangerous outskirts of Albion to elegant Victorian-era studies and quaint confectioneries.
• MEET INTRIGUING CHARACTERS
Immerse yourself in the magical world beyond the mirror, full of heroes you’ve known since childhood as well as unique new characters, all of whom have something to hide.
• UNRAVEL PLOTS AND FIGHT CRIME
Engage in exciting battles with the criminals of Albion and prove that you can bring order to the city and learn all its secrets.
• IMMERSE YOURSELF IN THE MYSTERIOUS DETECTIVE STORY
Go on a journey through foggy Albion, a city full of thieves, puzzles, and wonder. Discover things that no one else has seen!
• EXPLORE NEW PLACES EVERY DAY
Earn experience points to gain access to incredible new places and buildings! If you’re hungry for more, you can always purchase keys to new locations and other items within the game with real money to speed up the process.
• APPLE WATCH COMPANION APP. Unlock chests and find valuable bonuses every few hours. If you want more, just allow access to your health data and earn rewards for your steps! Keep track of all events, energy amounts, and the duration of amulets. Now, you won’t miss a thing!
• THIS GAME WORKS IN OFFLINE MODE WITHOUT AN INTERNET CONNECTION — enjoy it on a plane, on the subway, or on the road!
